Documentation for the Tests¶

zfsunittest.py¶

class zfsunittest.ZfsTestCase(methodName='runTest')¶

Class with helpful methods for clear testing zfs.

Inherit from unittest.TestCase

_zpool_generate(zpool_name, fs_names=[], snapshots=[])¶

Generate temporary pool

_zpool_clean(zpool_name)¶

Remove temporary pool

test_zfswrapper.py¶

class test_zfswrapper.ZfswrapperTest(methodName='runTest')¶

Inherit from zfsunittest.ZfsTestCase

test_zfs_list()¶

zfs_list without args - return list all filesystems and snapshots. By default volumes are not included.

test_zfs_list_defined_fs()¶

zfs_list with defined fs - return list only filesystems and snapshots given fs

test_zfs_list_defined_types()¶

zfs_list with defined types - return list all ‘types’ for given fs

test_zfs_list_not_existing_fs()¶

zfs_list return None if given fs not exist
